document_data.mainbody:
The Breasal Marsh was a marshland located on the isle of Moray within the Moonshae Isles.
The Breasal Marsh was located toward the center of the island. It covered approximately , making it one of the prominent geographical features of Moray. The marsh was fed by the Shannyth River flowing in from the south, which also exited the marshs northern edge at Lac Dynnegall. The village of Horst sat on the southeast edge of the Breasal Marsh.
Tribes of lizardfolk lived within the marsh. Some of the tribes wished to reawaken Kazgaroth, while others were more peaceful and followed Silvanus.
